TEXT.English: When humans first evolved, they made temporary structures and moved often.
TEXT.French: When humans first evolved, they made temporary structures and moved often.
TEXT.German: When humans first evolved, they made temporary structures and moved often.
TEXT.Italian: When humans first evolved, they made temporary structures and moved often.
TEXT.Spanish: When humans first evolved, they made temporary structures and moved often.

TEXT.English: Humans invented language to communicate well with each other.
TEXT.French: Humans invented language to communicate well with each other.
TEXT.German: Humans invented language to communicate well with each other.
TEXT.Italian: Humans invented language to communicate well with each other.
TEXT.Spanish: Humans invented language to communicate well with each other.

TEXT.English: In the early years of human history, people lived in temporary structures. As the tribe grew larger, nomadic life would not produce enough food to sustain them. Sedentism, together with farming, helped people settle down and thrive.
TEXT.French: In the early years of human history, people lived in temporary structures. As the tribe grew larger, nomadic life would not produce enough food to sustain them. Sedentism, together with farming, helped people settle down and thrive.
TEXT.German: In the early years of human history, people lived in temporary structures. As the tribe grew larger, nomadic life would not produce enough food to sustain them. Sedentism, together with farming, helped people settle down and thrive.
TEXT.Italian: In the early years of human history, people lived in temporary structures. As the tribe grew larger, nomadic life would not produce enough food to sustain them. Sedentism, together with farming, helped people settle down and thrive.
TEXT.Spanish: In the early years of human history, people lived in temporary structures. As the tribe grew larger, nomadic life would not produce enough food to sustain them. Sedentism, together with farming, helped people settle down and thrive.

TEXT.English: Classical Antiquity refers to the period of Greco-Roman history. It extends back to 8th century BC when Rome was founded, and continued until 476 AD.
TEXT.French: Classical Antiquity refers to the period of Greco-Roman history. It extends back to 8th century BC when Rome was founded, and continued until 476 AD.

TEXT.Spanish: Classical Antiquity refers to the period of Greco-Roman history. It extends back to 8th century BC when Rome was founded, and continued until 476 AD.

TEXT.English: The spirituality of people has been established in Stone Age. Since then, people wanted to worship and learn from their ancestors.
